website_summaries.verdict: Bolder frames make a compliment magnet with this pair of sunnies.
pros: Thicker frame is masculine and provides durability
Crystal lenses with UVA and UVB protection

customer_reviews.title: Classic sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Classic shades. I prefer these to the 714s because of the slightly "meatier" silhouette. I ordered mine from the "Designer Eyewear" seller and they appear legit. If not, they're the best fakes I've ever seen and close enough that I don't care, since they cost a fraction of the retail price. On the sizing: if you generally get larger sized sunglasses, these will fit you. I.e. don't assume these will be the right size if you wear 55mm aviators, because the measurements on the frame are different; I wear 62mm aviators and these fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PhilC

customer_reviews.title: The glass frame is awesome but the color of the lense is not as ...
customer_reviews.text: The glass frame is awesome but the color of the lense is not as show in the picture, returned them due to misleading lens color in exchange for havana lenses due to the fact the frame and craftmanship is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaldo

customer_reviews.title: Faux Persol
customer_reviews.text: Obvious faux Persols upon arrival, don’t waste your time on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Cool as ice, and Steve McQueen was over rated.
customer_reviews.text: Quality, coolness factor, and don't sit on them. I could be anyone in these shades. A man of the world, A cock rockin' Aldi's shopper. You name it. Tortoise shell w/ blue lenses? If that isn't cool I don't know what is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. Not polarized, by not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Overall I was disappointed in these Persols. For the price point I expected higher quality with better tolerances. I ended up returning them. Though owned by the same corporation Rayban makes a better product, as does Anerican Optical(for a lot less).
customer_reviews.author: TradeKraft

customer_reviews.title: Buy Small
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 54-55mm pair of glasses, but these in 54 just looked way too big on me. Otherwise the glasses are super well made. Also: The lenses aren't as blue as this picture makes them out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical about Persols for 50% off... but impressed
customer_reviews.text: I lost my P0649s in the ocean, so I ordered these. I fully expected them to be fake, but figured the worst outcome was I return them. They are real, high quality, with crystal lenses. Only differences - different case than Sunglass Hut gives you (who cares) and for some reason the etching in the lenses wasn’t sanded properly so it kinda grabs the microfiber cloth (who cares). This is definitely the way to go if you want Persols and don’t want to drop $350
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Not good fit. Seems stretched. Very big
customer_reviews.text: Came in a squashed case within a padded envelope. No tags. No box. No cleaning cloth. Not sure if these are irregulars or factory seconds but something is not quite right. The arms seemed "stretched out". I have a big head, but nobody has one that big. Returned about 5 minutes after trying these on. Not even close. Ordered a pair of 714s from Amazon and WHAT A DIFFERENCE!.
customer_reviews.author: scaramanga

customer_reviews.title: Product is genuine and without flaws.
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering if I should try ordering these sunglasses after I read all the reviews. I took a chance and ordered them and I'm extremely happy with my purchase. They arrived earlier than expected and are exactly as described. I believe that they are original product and not counterfeit. I looked for any flaws and I Cannot find anything wrong with them. I'm very happy with my purchase and the excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott's prime

customer_reviews.title: They’re legit
customer_reviews.text: These are legit persols. They’re as described. Come with proper box cleaning cloth etc. what was disappointing is they don’t done send them very quickly or the proper priority. Got them a week later than amazon had predicted
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Muller

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Looks right, but not sure if authentic, the persol logró on 1 arm is kind of blur.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Hiraldo

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Glasses looked nice. But listing is confusing. Headline-description says 52mm, but details say 54mm. I was hoping to get 54mm but got the 52mm instead. Too small.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: For a proper fit, read the Persol product description carefully
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality & look of Persol sunglasses. Persol sunglasses come in a lot of sizes. The earpiece length, nose bridge width, & lens size. Measure your face or a well fitting pair of glasses & read the Persol description carefully. Properly fitted glasses will take a bit of work, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kw-2wheel

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED!!!Husband was wanting these glasses for a long time...but way too much at retail stores...was totally satisfied with the price....everything was there this is the real deal...Persol..."The sunglasses that look to the past for your future"...Amazon drives a good bargain home, with products that aren't black market sold china knock offs outta someones inner coat pocket, on a sidewalk in lower Manhatten...Thanks again for the sunglasses..will definately keep shoppin Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: lcwatkins310

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: Glassess had an odd fit, extremely lose with a less than comfortable feel all around.
customer_reviews.author: VAJ

customer_reviews.title: Love the Tortoise Frames/Green Lenses
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find tortoise frames with anything but the brown lenses in the store. The green is soothing and offers great sun protection. I Ike the aviator style, which offers generous coverage. Persol glass are hand crafted and the quality is unsurpassed. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: Lookin good
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, always quality with persole, high recognized overseas. I got blk with green lens, very dark wich I like. Go brown if you dont like em as dark. They need adjusted some but very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: It looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, beautiful pair of glasses i exclusively wear persol so im a little biased but this is my favourite pair although it doesnt do much in terms of shade as it is my first non-polarized pair but its still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just perfect, lighter than the ones that fold (i had ...
customer_reviews.text: just perfect, lighter than the ones that fold (i had those too and lost them...) so i like these better one small detail, they are not polarized and maybe a little small for my face, but that is not their fault ;-) i knew when ordering...
customer_reviews.author: Armando Cavero

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses heaven
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my new polarized 649 Persols! They are esquisitely made and arrived in a beautiful case in no time. I very much recommend this brand and this seller- thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool Glasses. They are huge.
customer_reviews.text: These are cool glasses.But make sure this is the size you need. Its the first custom sized pair and pricey pair I've ever rewarded myself. Store bought cheap sunglasses are always too small. So I bought big. They are a bit too wide even though I'm tall and have, what I thought was, a large head.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Grudzinskas

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses available!
customer_reviews.text: I love Persol sunglasses and love finding them on Amazon at such great prices. I've owned a few pairs of Maui Jims and Ray Bans, but always go back to Persol. Their crystal lenses have unbelievable clarity and the frames are awesome quality. Love the Arrow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great prices. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great prices. Great customer service. Great response time. But my frames were delivered with some scratches. Shame too, because otherwise it would have been more than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: weird fit
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of this model I own, but these were odd. The temples were very wide almost like a V not holding on to my head ver well, where my other Persols (also size 52) are more of a U and hold on my head quite well. None the less very quick delivery and I'm 99.99% sure they're authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto B

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good frame, but lens are not polarized nor the color advertised as well.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sun glasses but too large for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaldo

customer_reviews.title: Always fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sunglasses. There are some complaints about the cost, but there IS a difference between a $20.00 pair and the good ones. Well-made and, well, Persol's just look good. Super-fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hearty

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy based solely on the photos
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two pairs of these sunglasses. While they are OK, they do not look the same as I perceived from the photos. The lesson is this is not the kind of item that should be purchased online unless you have first seen the exact model and color in person.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Loupee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality authentic Persol---Only issue is the vendor sent me the wrong style. Had to return. Simple error.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Nose bridge makes this not a good fit for mose faces
customer_reviews.text: It's fine looking but the nose is too small for myself and pretty much everyone else that has seen them
customer_reviews.author: davidsan

customer_reviews.title: If you're cool w/ getting factory seconds @ a discount then go ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was OK - buyer beware thought - these appear to be factory 'b' sunglasses. The ones I received had a slightly bent frame. You get what you pay for. If you're cool w/ getting factory seconds @ a discount then go for it. Glasses appeared to be authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2 weeks cracked in half. Fake don’t order
customer_reviews.author: Francis Ferreyra

customer_reviews.title: Glasses are great but needed a lot of adjustments before they fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are great but needed a lot of adjustments before they fit right. Probably why the price was so good. Overall would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great fit and great style.Best price I found on these Persol's.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality. Can immediately appreciate the premium feel of the heavy frame. Although the lenses are more transparent than I anticipated, I'm nonetheless thrilled with the overall look.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: awesome, great price- way lower than at the mall. Sold & delivered by amazon.com so they're legit.
customer_reviews.author: Homero

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: Temples are really bowed out. Good for large heads, but didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses are just the same as described. Great quality. Size 52 - good for men, a bit big for women (just tried them). I'm in love with them! Very fast shipment with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Hope you get a good pair
customer_reviews.text: I think they were real but one of the bolts was loose and the 52mm was much too small.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses...i love the quality and the look of it...worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Santana

customer_reviews.title: Oozing panache, not polarized as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These were expensive! These were not polarized as very specifically noted in product title! At 52mm, these sat a pinch small on my average sized face. Many people have no idea what Per Sol is, but they will sense that somehow you have much more disposable income than they, and that you dress slightly better than the average human. Pros: Fresh, Hella Dope, Timeless design. Word. Cons: Makes wallet cry, not polarized as very specifically noted in product title, someone who obviously isn't as cultured and fashionistically tuned in to premium eye-wear like you may think you're just as worthy a human being in $5 sunglasses as they do when you wear overpriced exclusive $200+ sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Roe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a cousin. So far he is happy with the product. So I am assuming its a good buy. The glasses came in a very good condition. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses but the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses but the wrong size. Way too small and I thought they were bigger. Web site should have better descriptions. I have to return
customer_reviews.author: jh77

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend purchasing these as the shipping took weeks
customer_reviews.text: These were clearly not Persol's. The brand written on them was "Ray-Ban". Persol's should be able to fold at the temple, which these did not. I would not recommend purchasing these as the shipping took weeks, the product was not as advertised and the quality was cheaply made. I should've known better.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: don't stay on the top of my head as well as others do but other than that i really like these: )
customer_reviews.text: Lovely pair of glasses, don't stay on the top of my head as well as others do but other than that i really like these :)
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are racist.
customer_reviews.text: This won't fit you at all if you're Asian, which is ironic considering how cheaply made this is. Arms started warping out of shape and falling apart after just a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Wrong glasses
customer_reviews.text: Sent me the totally wrong glasses. I received girls glasses that look nothing like these. Only similarity was that they were Persols. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Henson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be Bootleg
customer_reviews.text: Seem like a good deal as these are priced at $300 at Sunglass hut. However, these had small flaws in them and they definitely don’t feel like the ones at Sunglass hut. My instinct says these are Bootleg.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ann Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent. They fold really nicely. Best sunglasses I have bought. Seller shipped them within a few hours. Got delivered in a day. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Chapa

customer_reviews.title: close but no cigar
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned 2 pair of Persol's and have loved them but was disappointed they no longer offer that style. I looked at the pair shown at a local store. Then I went online here and purchased them for $70.00 usd cheaper. Great right? The problem is the pair I looked at in the store were apparently women's and I ordered the men's. The shape of the lenses and the way they form to your face is different. I tossed the box and tags or I would have retuned them.
customer_reviews.author: michael
